channel.title: List on Noetic Nought
channel.description: Recent content in List on Noetic Nought

item.title: org2blog on the web
item.description: Well, it’s been a week of lull on my blog. Not that I’m very busy. But, just didn’t have anything to post. I was feeling jobless today and searched the web for org2blog users. Here is what I found. This is a test post from org2blog Posting from emacs and org-mode Vim vs Emacs, or why it really doesn’t matter Posting subtree from org-mode buffer (take 2) Here’s a test post to wordpress for Org2blog – an Emacs plugin Primeiro post usando org2blog Emacs中绘图－ ditaa篇 org2blog on identi.ca Marcel van der Boom – StatusNet
